summary: This is a retex of Tyen\'s Master Sword from his The Legend of Zelda: A Skyrim Modification.
descriptionHtml:
This is a retex of Tyen\'s Master Sword included in his \"The Legend of Zelda: A Skyrim Modification\" pack. My hopes are that it more closely resembles the more recent iterations of the Master Sword.

Key points:
The hilt is more purple. Perhaps too dark, but it looks less cartoony that way.
The pommel \"cap\" with the Hyrule symbol is light purple. I tried a gold, but it\'s yuk.
The grip, though commonly shown as purple, remains Tyen\'s original brown.
The diamond on the hilt is now collared, perhaps I\'ll add the flourishes later.
The hilt guard has been kinda extended into the blade so that it touches the diamond. I only did a texture edit, so it\'s not perfect.
Added trim that extends from the hilt up about three inches.
Replaced the Triforce symbol with something that looks engraved in.

NOTE: The Triforce Symbol on the blade on Tyen\'s model is 3D and pops out, but my version never had it, just something that looked penciled in as a placeholder(?) Anyway, if yours has that, it\'s gold now and will probably overlap with my edit.
author: jsnforce
